text: @realDonaldTrump You said you had it all in hand &  everyone who wanted a test would get a test.  A month & a half later, you still haven't kept your promise & you're trying to blame state governors. Why? Because you couldn't organise it with the whole federal government?  https://t.co/kQkNb3FpTp
